title: Classified turns it up to 13-speed with Campy Ekar compatible cassette
content:
Classified’s Powershift gravel bike drivetrain just got one more gear, thanks to a new compact 13-speed cassette that brings compatibility to your Campagnolo Ekar-equipped bike.…

The post Classified turns it up to 13-speed with Campy Ekar compatible cassette appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
